description: A policy for access control assigned to a Host, Role, User, UserGroup, or Service.

admin.description: Indicates if the policy grants administrative privilege.

rules.description: Rules of this policy. Each rule is written 'as-code' that can be operationalized with a control provider or within JupiterOne's rules engine.

content.description: Content of a policy contains the raw policy rules, if applicable. For example, the JSON text of an AWS IAM Policy. This is stored in raw data.
